articles.title: NVIDIA and Synopsys Announce Strategic Partnership to Revolutionize Engineering and Design
articles.summary: NVIDIA (NASDAQ: NVDA) and Synopsys, Inc. (NASDAQ: SNPS) today announced an expanded, strategic partnership to revolutionize design and engineering across industries.

articles.title: The Largest Digital Zoo: Biology Model Trained on NVIDIA GPUs Identifies Over a Million Species
articles.summary: Tanya Berger-Wolfâ€™s first computational biology project started as a bet with a colleague: that she could build an AI model capable of identifying individual zebras faster than a zoologist. She won. Now, the director of the Translational Data Analytics Institute and a professor at The Ohio State University, Berger-Wolf is taking on the whole animal
articles.author: Zoe Kessler
